announcements.content: The weather is great today, enjoy it :)
We are sorry that the  11:45  Heathrow Connect service to Whitstable is delayed by approximately 45 minutes. We apologise for the disruption to your journey today.
Please note, to ensure a timely departure, train doors will be locked shut up to 40 seconds before departure. Thank you.
The next train to arrive at platform 4 is not in passenger service. Please do not board the next train at platform 4.

May I have your attention please on platform 19. We are sorry to announce that the  11:51  service to Lymington Town   is delayed by approximately 50 minutes. Please listen for further announcements. We apologise for the inconvenience this may cause you.
Penalty fares apply across the entire Virgin Trains East Coast network. Please ensure that you buy your ticket before you board, where facilities are available.
